item.title: NBFCs 需要比 RBI 降息更多的宽松政策来提高收益
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 关税威胁迫在眉睫，日产、本田在华销售低迷
item.description: 日产汽车公司和本田汽车公司的财报有可能因更紧密的整合谈判即将破裂而蒙上阴影。【原文：Nissan Motor Co.’s and Honda Motor Co.’s earnings reports risk being overshadowed by the impending collapse of closer integration talks.】

item.title: Blackstone 同意以 11 亿美元的交易从 TruArc 收购 AI Fire
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 同意以约 11 亿美元（含债务）的价格收购 AI Fire。【原文：Blackstone Inc. agreed to buy AI Fire for about $1.1 billion including debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 水泥生产商泰坦美国分公司首次公开募股融资 3.84 亿美元
item.description: 泰坦美国公司（Titan America SA）及其所有者泰坦水泥国际公司（Titan Cement International SA）在首次公开募股中筹集了 3.84 亿美元，股票定价在市场范围内。【原文：Titan America SA and its owner Titan Cement International SA raised $384 million in an initial public offering, pricing its shares within a marketed range.】

item.title: 为退出俄罗斯，欧洲或将获得稀有的澳大利亚天然气船运服务
item.description: 自 2022 年以来，一批澳大利亚液化天然气似乎将首次运往欧洲，这一罕见的举动凸显了该地区需要更多的海运来替代俄罗斯管道燃料的损失。【原文：A shipment of Australian liquefied natural gas appears to be heading to Europe for the first time since 2022, a rare move that highlights the region’s need to pull in more seaborne deliveries to replace the loss of Russian pipeline fuel.】

item.title: 据说 Veritas 正在洽谈收购数据公司 Dun & Bradstreet
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Veritas Capital Fund Management 正在洽谈收购华尔街历史最悠久的数据和分析供应商之一 Dun & Bradstreet Holdings Inc.【原文：Veritas Capital Fund Management is in talks to acquire Dun & Bradstreet Holdings Inc., one of Wall Street’s oldest data and analytics providers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DeepSeek 炒作下的中国科技股接近技术性牛市
item.description: 在初创公司 DeepSeek 推出廉价人工智能模型，点燃了市场对中国互联网公司的兴趣之后，在香港交易的中国科技股有望进入技术性牛市。【原文：A gauge of Chinese tech shares trading in Hong Kong was poised to enter a technical bull market after a cheap artificial intelligence model from startup DeepSeek ignited interest in China’s internet firms.】

item.title: 韩国天然气公司股票大跌，原因是被寄予厚望的勘探结果令人失望
item.description: 韩国天然气公司（Korea Gas Corp.）跌幅高达 15%，因为政府称，一个被大力宣传的近海油田的初步钻探结果令人失望，该油田曾给人们带来了能源红利的希望。【原文：Korea Gas Corp. tumbled as much as 15% after the government said initial drilling of a heavily publicized offshore field, which raised hopes of an energy bonanza, were disappointing.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告：日本需要立即削减赤字以修正财政路径
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）驻日本代表处主任表示，随着自然灾害风险的增加和社会保障成本的持续上升，日本必须立即采取行动改善其财政状况。【原文：Japan must act immediately to improve its fiscal health as the risks of natural disasters mount and social security costs continue to increase, according to the International Monetary Fund’s mission chief for the nation.】

item.title: 中国收益率曲线因现金充裕和押注宽松而停止趋平
item.description: 中国努力保持在岸市场流动性充裕，推动了短端收益率的下降，同时在一定程度上缓解了当局所厌恶的趋平曲线。【原文：China’s effort to keep liquidity conditions ample in the onshore market is pushing down short-end yields while offering some relief from a flattening curve loathed by authorities.】

item.title: 无法访问美国人口普查有关人口估计的网页
item.description: 周四晚些时候，美国人口普查局的几个数据集无法访问，该机构网站上的某些人口数字无法下载。【原文：Several datasets from the US Census Bureau were inaccessible late Thursday, with certain population figures unavailable to download on the agency’s website.】

item.title: 展望医疗签署临时协议避免医院关闭
item.description: 破产的医疗系统前景医疗控股公司（Prospect Medical Holdings Inc.【原文：Bankrupt health system Prospect Medical Holdings Inc. won court approval to hand operations of its Pennsylvania hospitals to a state-backed receiver, a last minute deal that averts potential closures of critical health centers.】

item.title: 工资上涨，日本家庭支出创 2022 年以来最大增幅
item.description: 日本家庭以 2022 年 8 月以来最快的速度提高了消费，原因是奖金带来的强劲工资增长有助于放松钱包。【原文：Japan’s households boosted consumption at the fastest pace since August 2022, as strong wage gains led by bonuses helped loosen purse strings.】

item.title: 特朗普征收关税，推动能源发展，石油将迎来第三周下跌
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国征收关税并推动国内增产，需求前景受到影响，石油连续第三周下跌。【原文：Oil headed for a third weekly decline as President Donald Trump’s tariffs on China and his push for increased domestic production weighed on the demand outlook.】

item.title: 能源、国防和人工智能类股成为日本市场关注焦点，石破茂在美国上市
item.description: 周五，日本首相石破茂准备与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普举行首次会晤，日本市场的风险和机遇意识正在增强。【原文：A heightened sense of risk and opportunity is building in Japanese markets on Friday as Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba prepares for his first meeting with President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 新西兰暗示将允许更多外国投资者购房
item.description: 新西兰外交部长温斯顿-彼得斯（Winston Peters）表示，新西兰需要建立一个对富有的海外投资者有吸引力的经济和规则，其中可能包括允许他们购买住房。【原文：New Zealand needs to create an economy and rules that are attractive to wealthy overseas investors, which could include allowing them to purchase homes, according to Foreign Minister Winston Peters.】

item.title: 苹果期待已久的 iPhone SE 大改即将发布
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）计划在未来几天内推出期待已久的 iPhone SE 大改版，此举将使其低价机型现代化，以刺激增长并吸引消费者从其他品牌转而购买。【原文：Apple Inc. plans to unveil a long-anticipated overhaul of the iPhone SE in the coming days, a move that will modernize its lower-cost model in a bid to spur growth and entice consumers to switch from other brands.】

item.title: 扎克伯格访问白宫，讨论美国科技领导力问题
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.公司发言人安迪-斯通（Andy Stone）在 X 网站上发表文章说，公司首席执行官马克-扎克伯格周四访问了白宫，讨论公司如何支持特朗普政府加强美国科技领导力的努力。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg visited the White House on Thursday to discuss how the company can support Trump administration efforts to strengthen US tech leadership, company spokesman Andy Stone said in a post on X.】

item.title: 贝森特在与马斯克 "完全保持一致 "的同时表现出平常心
item.description: 斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）担任财政部部长仅两周时间，就经历了许多动荡。财政部成为了埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）打击联邦开支的目标，引发了贝森特办公室外的抗议活动；唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统难以预测的贸易政策也让投资者惶恐不安。【原文：In just two weeks as Treasury chief, Scott Bessent has seen plenty of turbulence. The department became a target of Elon Musk’s crackdown on federal spending — triggering protests outside Bessent’s office — and investors are on edge over President Donald Trump’s unpredictable trade policies.】

item.title: 特朗普的世界自由金融公司计划建立 "战略 "代币储备库
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的 DeFi 项目 "世界自由金融"（World Liberty Financial）的联合创始人蔡斯-赫罗（Chase Herro）说，该平台计划用购买的代币创建一个 "战略储备"。【原文：Chase Herro, co-founder of President Donald Trump’s DeFi project, World Liberty Financial, said the platform plans on creating a “strategic reserve” with tokens bought.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利说，美国银行告诉我他们希望实施巴塞尔协议
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，美国贷款机构热衷于引入新的资本要求，即使监管机构暂停这些措施以观察特朗普政府如何对待华尔街。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said American lenders are keen for new capital requirements to be introduced, even as regulators pause the measures to see how the Trump administration approaches Wall Street.】

item.title: 美国就业报告公布前，亚洲股市下跌，日元升值：市场综述
item.description: 周五亚洲股市早盘下跌，此前华尔街走势平淡，交易商在等待美国就业数据，这些数据将有助于阐明未来的利率走势。【原文：Asian stocks headed for early declines Friday after muted moves on Wall Street as traders awaited US jobs data that will help illuminate the path ahead for interest rates.】

item.title: 特朗普震荡下注，交易员利润瞬间蒸发
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战的初期，市场出现了一波又一波的进退，迫使交易商不得不做出调整，越来越多地下注于比往常更保守或更容易逆转的交易。【原文：The early days of Donald Trump’s trade war have been marked by a flurry of advances and retreats, forcing traders to adapt by increasingly making bets that are more conservative than usual or easily reversed.】

item.title: 美联储洛根对进一步降息的必要性持怀疑态度
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）表示，利率可能已经接近中性水平，即使通胀继续降温，也可能无需进一步降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan said interest rates may already be near a neutral level, potentially obviating the need for further cuts even if inflation continues to cool.】

item.title: 特朗普加大压力，欧洲因市场崩溃而步履蹒跚
item.description:
支离破碎的系统让企业感到沮丧，并损害了经济。【原文：

A fractured system is frustrating businesses and hurting the economy.

】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰不会跟随同行建立私人信贷市场
item.description: 另类投资公司蓝猫（Blue Owl Capital）并不打算步竞争对手的后尘，这些竞争对手一直在建立私人信用贷款市场。【原文：Alternative investment firm Blue Owl Capital is not planning to follow in the footsteps of competitors who have been setting up marketplaces for private credit loans.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔称稳定币可巩固美元的储备地位
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，他支持稳定币，因为它们有可能提升美元作为储备货币的地位，不过它们需要一套明确的规则和监管。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said he’s supportive of stablecoins because they are likely to propagate the dollar’s status as a reserve currency, though they need a clear set of rules and regulations.】

item.title: 亚马逊预计利润低于预期，原因是人工智能支出增加
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）预计本季度的利润低于分析师的预期，这表明该公司将继续加大支出以支持人工智能服务。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. projected profit in the current quarter that fell short of analysts’ estimates, suggesting the company continues to ramp up spending to support artificial intelligence services.】

item.title: Pinterest 第四季度销售额和营收前景超出预期
item.description: Pinterest 公司公布了强劲的假日季度营收，并对当期销售额做出了乐观的预测，这表明尽管来自社交网络领域规模更大的竞争对手的竞争日益激烈，该公司的广告业务仍在继续增长。该公司股价在尾盘交易中大涨超过 27%。【原文：Pinterest Inc. posted strong holiday-quarter revenue and gave an upbeat forecast for sales in the current period, a sign that its advertising business continues to grow despite increased competition from much larger rivals in the social networking space. The shares surged more than 27% in late trading.】

item.title: Expedia 节假日预订量强劲，证明需求具有弹性
item.description: Expedia Group Inc. 公布的 2024 年最后几个月的总预订量好于预期，反映了冬季假日季节旅游需求的恢复性增长。【原文：Expedia Group Inc. posted better-than-expected gross bookings for the final months of 2024, reflecting resilient demand for travel during the winter holiday season.】
